aws_api_gateway_account.description: Provides a settings of an API Gateway Account.

cloudwatch_role_arn.description: The ARN of an IAM role for CloudWatch (to allow logging & monitoring).

throttle_settings.description: Account-Level throttle settings. See exported fields below.

burst_limit.description: The absolute maximum number of times API Gateway allows the API to be called per second (RPS).

rate_limit.description: The number of times API Gateway allows the API to be called per second on average (RPS).
